x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
Field "Row Data" on CAD Entities Staging Table, Max Length should be 4000. If not then give warning
Field "GeoJSON Data" on CAD Entities Staging record Max Length 4000
Field "Layer Data" on Space Layer Details table, record Max Length 8000
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Checking CAD Record Max Length Values
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Set the max length to 4,000 or 8,000 respectively.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Checking CAD Record Max Length Values

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_7b1b978c1b3a611088b2777e0a4bcb2c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Field "Row Data" on CAD Entities Staging Table, Max Length should be 4000. If not then give warning

Field "GeoJSON Data" on CAD Entities Staging record Max Length 4000

Field "Layer Data" on Space Layer Details table, record Max Length 8000</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Checking CAD Record Max Length Values</name><order/><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Set the max length to 4,000 or 8,000 respectively.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
var mLength = 0;

//checking for row_data.
gr.addQuery('element','row_data');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

if (gr.next()){
	mLength = gr.getValue('max_length');
	if (mLength < 4000)
		util.handleOutput('The Max Length for the Row Data is set incorrectly. It is set to ' + mLength + ' when it should be set to 4000.','warning','CAD Extension');
}

//checking for GeoJSON Data
gr = null;
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');

gr.addQuery('element','geojson_data');
gr.addQuery('name','x_nuvo_eam_dxf_staging_table');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

if(gr.next()){
	mLength = gr.getValue('max_length');
	if(mLength < 4000)
		util.handleOutput('The Max Length for the GeoJSON Data is set incorrectly. It is set to ' + mLength + ' when it should be set to 4000.','warning','CAD Extension');
}

//checking for Layer Data
gr = null;
gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');

gr.addQuery('element','layer_data');
gr.addQuery('name','x_nuvo_eam_space_layer_details');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.query();

if(gr.next()){
	mLength = gr.getValue('max_length');
	if(mLength < 8000)
		util.handleOutput('The Max Length for the Layer Data is set incorrectly. It is set to ' + mLength + ' when it should be set to 8000.','warning','CAD Extension');
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>pierson.arnold@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-05-09 20:56:43</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b1b978c1b3a611088b2777e0a4bcb2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Checking CAD Record Max Length Values</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_7b1b978c1b3a611088b2777e0a4bcb2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:26</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
sys_update_version.record_name: Checking CAD Record Max Length Values

sys_audit_delete.display_value: Checking CAD Record Max Length Values

sys_metadata_delete.sys_name: Checking CAD Record Max Length Values
